bioAsHtml: Omer van Kloeten is a veteran software developer of 16 years with a wide range of experience in leading roles, ranging from Dev Lead, through Architect, to CTO and even Product. Scala has been his favorite for the last six years and he has a passion for sharing knowledge.
bio:
Omer van Kloeten is a veteran software developer of 16 years with a wide range of experience in leading roles, ranging from Dev Lead, through Architect, to CTO and even Product.
Scala has been his favorite for the last six years and he has a passion for sharing knowledge.
